languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт вскидывает руку, словно пытается остановить ваши слова.{/n} "Довольно! Твоя слепота к истинной злокозненности природы этого творения поражает, элантах. Остановись, ибо я не хочу более слушать это безумие!"

{n}Yrliet throws out her arm as if in an attempt to halt your words.{/n} "Enough! Your obliviousness to the true atrocious nature of this creation is staggering, elantach. Stop, for I wish not to hear another word of this madness!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт вскидывает руку, словно пытается остановить ваши слова.{/n} "Довольно! Твоя слепота к истинной злокозненности природы этого творения поражает, элантах. Остановись, ибо я не хочу более слушать это безумие!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet throws out her arm, as if in an attempt to halt your words.{/n} "Enough! Your obliviousness to the true atrocious nature of this creation is staggering, elantach. Stop, for I wish not to hear another word of this madness!"

{n}Yrliet throws out her arm, as if in an attempt to halt your words.{/n} "Enough! Your obliviousness to the true atrocious nature of this creation is staggering, elantach. Stop, for I wish not to hear another word of this madness!"

{n}Yrliet throws out her arm as if in an attempt to halt your words.{/n} "Enough! Your obliviousness to the true atrocious nature of this creation is staggering, elantach. Stop, for I wish not to hear another word of this madness!"

{n}Yrliet throws out her arm as if in an attempt to halt your words.{/n} "Enough! Your obliviousness to the true atrocious nature of this creation is staggering, elantach. Stop, for I wish not to hear another word of this madness!"

{n}Yrliet throws out her arm as if in an attempt to halt your words.{/n} "Enough! Your obliviousness to the true atrocious nature of this creation is staggering, elantach. Stop, for I wish not to hear another word of this madness!"

languages.text: {n}Yrliet tend un bras devant elle, comme pour empêcher vos paroles de l'atteindre.{/n} « Assez ! Je n'arrive pas à concevoir que vous puissiez être à ce point aveugle à la nature atroce de cette création, elantach. Taisez-vous, je ne veux plus entendre ces propos insensés ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet throws out her arm as if in an attempt to halt your words.{/n} "Enough! Your obliviousness to the true atrocious nature of this creation is staggering, elantach. Stop, for I wish not to hear another word of this madness!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet tend un bras devant elle, comme pour empêcher vos paroles de l'atteindre.{/n} « Assez ! Je n'arrive pas à concevoir que vous puissiez être à ce point aveugle à la nature atroce de cette création, elantach. Taisez-vous, je ne veux plus entendre ces propos insensés ! »

languages.text: {n}Yrliets Arm schießt vor, als würde sie versuchen wollen, deine Worte aufzuhalten.{/n} "Genug! Es ist unerträglich, dass Ihr das grauenhafte Wesen dieser Schöpfung nicht erkennen wollt, Elantach. Haltet ein, denn ich will kein weiteres Wort dieses Irrsinns hören!"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet throws out her arm as if in an attempt to halt your words.{/n} "Enough! Your obliviousness to the true atrocious nature of this creation is staggering, elantach. Stop, for I wish not to hear another word of this madness!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliets Arm schießt vor, als würde sie versuchen wollen, deine Worte aufzuhalten.{/n} "Genug! Es ist unerträglich, dass Ihr das grauenhafte Wesen dieser Schöpfung nicht erkennen wollt, Elantach. Haltet ein, denn ich will kein weiteres Wort dieses Irrsinns hören!"

languages.text: {n}Yrliet extiende el brazo como si quisiera detener tus palabras con él.{/n} «¡Basta! Tu ignorancia en lo que a la verdadera y atroz naturaleza de esta cosa respecta es pasmosa, elantach. ¡Calla, no quiero oír otra palabra de esta locura!».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet throws out her arm as if in an attempt to halt your words.{/n} "Enough! Your obliviousness to the true atrocious nature of this creation is staggering, elantach. Stop, for I wish not to hear another word of this madness!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet extiende el brazo como si quisiera detener tus palabras con él.{/n} «¡Basta! Tu ignorancia en lo que a la verdadera y atroz naturaleza de esta cosa respecta es pasmosa, elantach. ¡Calla, no quiero oír otra palabra de esta locura!».

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはあなたの言葉を遮ろうとするように手を伸ばす。{/n}「もういい！この創造物の残忍な本質への無理解さには驚くべきものがあるな、エランタ。止めてくれ、もうこんな狂言は聞きたくない！」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet throws out her arm as if in an attempt to halt your words.{/n} "Enough! Your obliviousness to the true atrocious nature of this creation is staggering, elantach. Stop, for I wish not to hear another word of this madness!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはあなたの言葉を遮ろうとするように手を伸ばす。{/n}「もういい！この創造物の残忍な本質への無理解さには驚くべきものがあるな、エランタ。止めてくれ、もうこんな狂言は聞きたくない！」

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特伸出手，仿佛要打断你的话一样。{/n}“够了！你完全不清楚这件造物残暴的本质。你的无知让我震惊，外界人。快住手吧，我再也不想听到这种疯言疯语了！”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet throws out her arm as if in an attempt to halt your words.{/n} "Enough! Your obliviousness to the true atrocious nature of this creation is staggering, elantach. Stop, for I wish not to hear another word of this madness!"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特伸出手，仿佛要打断你的话一样。{/n}“够了！你完全不清楚这件造物残暴的本质。你的无知让我震惊，外界人。快住手吧，我再也不想听到这种疯言疯语了！”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, seni susturmak istercesine kolunuzu uzatıyor.{/n} "Yeter! Bu yaratımın iğrenç doğasına karşı kayıtsızlığın, hayret verici elantach. Dur artık. Bu çılgınlığa dair tek bir kelime daha dahi duymak istemiyorum!"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet throws out her arm as if in an attempt to halt your words.{/n} "Enough! Your obliviousness to the true atrocious nature of this creation is staggering, elantach. Stop, for I wish not to hear another word of this madness!"
